City to End Electronic Regents Scoring

By ARIEL LEVY AND DAVID MASCIO ⋅ October 10, 2013 ⋅ Post a comment

The Department of Education (DOE) will return to a system of grading Regents examinations on paper this January. This reversion comes in response to the failure of the new system of electronic grading introduced in June 2013.
